abstract: Loopt, a mobile social-networking service, was eager to develop an application for the iPhone, despite the restrictions Apple placed on its partners.
snippet: Loopt, a mobile social-networking service, was eager to develop an application for the iPhone, despite the restrictions Apple placed on its partners.
lead_paragraph: How hungry are developers to create new applications for the iPhone?

headline.main: Loopt Eagerly Joins the iPhone Gold Rush
